name: Ace & Hearts
description:
The staff christmas party is tonight, and "Ace" Casey is flirting with her colleague Lila instead of working. In a couple of hours the drinks will start, and who knows what will happen if Ace plays her cards right...

-

Made for the Bitsy Secret Santa 2020 for Cygni on the given card-based themes of "Ace, Spade, Club". 

-

Thank you to Adam for making Bitsy, and Sean for hacking it.

-

Happy holigays
